about_the_game:
Upload is a 2D action-adventure game that combines a variety of gameplay experiences. You will travel between reality and the Internet to discover the buried history and uncover the truth of the world.

story

Was the cyber world created, or was it there from the beginning?

No one remembers the world as it really is.

All memories are sealed in yesterday, but yesterday has killed today.

Find the truth. There must be an answer at the end of the journey.

Go, while you're still you...

feature

■ High-speed combat experience with multiplayer switching

Experience multi-character free-match high-speed combat, form a team of your own style through reasonable configuration, and understand the enemy's use of strategy to complete gorgeous skills.

■ Trinity strategy decryption

Different characters have completely different special skills, with the help of brainstorming to grasp the tail of the light, with each other to draw the cocoon to conquer numerous puzzles.

■ Rich and varied plot branches

On your road, you will always face many large and small choices, and each of your measures may make the event enter a different track, stick to yourself and keep your heart, and move forward toward the light.

■ Well-designed world exploration

The world and the benchmark reality have their own unique built environment, many interesting treasures or secrets about the world are waiting for you to dig, don't let go of every corner.
